content.rendered:
Discover Maple is a chance for our incoming 6th graders, and new to the building 7th and 8th graders to spend time at Maple Avenue
Middle School. You will learn what to expect during the 2025-2026
school year. You’ll have a chance to navigate through the
building, find your locker, and walk through your schedule. In
addition to traditional walk-through activities, you’ll also have a
chance to work through the Back-to-School butterflies by
participating in fun and informative activities. Members of our
peer mentoring team will be offering tours every half hour.
Trust us, they have all the insider tips! You’ll also have plenty of
time to move at your own pace to visit several information
booths and participate in fun activities led by some of Maple
Avenue’s wonderful faculty and staff. There will be family
activities, and parents and siblings are welcome to attend.

Lunch will be provided for all family members
attending Discover Maple. Picnic tables will be
available. Find friends for some field games that
will be located right next to the picnic tables.

Session 1: Tuesday, 8/26 – 9 – 12 pm
Session 2: Tuesday, 8/26 – 12- 3 pm

The sign up link and more information was sent out via Parent Square!
